pkgmetadata.longdescription: # builddslA superset of the Python programming language with support for closures and multi-line lambdas.BuildDSL is an "almost superset" of Python 3; adding a lot of syntactical features that make it moreconvenient to describe build configurations at the cost of some other syntax features of the native Pythonlanguage (like set literals).## Installation $ pip install builddslThe `builddsl` package requires at least Python 3.8.## Projects using BuildDSL* [Novella](https://niklasrosenstein.github.io/novella/)
